Question: Shenzhen Peicheng Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Peicheng Technology Co., Ltd

Product: Tablets, digital Bluetooth speakers, robots

- Offers a range of tablets in various sizes from 7-inch to 10.1-10.51 inch flat panels
- Specializes in notebooks, netbooks, tablets, digital Bluetooth speakers, and robots
- Focuses on high efficiency, customer service, market expansion, and continuous improvement
- Provides customizable products with automated production and capacity delivery
- Emphasizes quality policy and customer satisfaction
- Integrates research and development, customized production, and sales
- Offers online services and has a customer base of domestic and foreign top-tier brands
- Located at 5th Floor, Building 64, Baotian Industrial Zone, Chentian Community, Xixiang Street, Bao'an District, Shenzhen
Summary_cn:
深圳培诚科技有限公司

产品：平板电脑、数码蓝牙音箱、机器人

- 提供多种尺寸的平板电脑，从7英寸到10.1-10.51英寸
- 专注于笔记本电脑、上网本、平板电脑、数码蓝牙音箱和机器人
- 专注于高效率、客户服务、市场拓展和持续改进
- 提供可定制的产品，具备自动化生产和产能交付能力
- 强调质量政策和客户满意度
- 整合研发、定制生产和销售
- 提供在线服务，拥有国内外一流品牌的客户群
- 位于深圳市宝安区西乡街道陈田社区宝田工业区64栋五楼
